sourcesContent:
My profile

Nombre: {{ user.name }}

Email: {{ user.email }}

Role: {{ user.role }}

Ir al CMS
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from 'src/app/models/user.model'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.scss'], }) export class ProfileComponent implements OnInit { user: User | null = null; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.authService.user$.subscribe((data) => { this.user = data; }); } }
